generatorTemplate.name: refocus-sgt-trust1
generatorTemplate.description: A Refocus Sample Generator Template for generating samples based on Salesforce's Trust1 API.

baseTrustUrl.description: The base url of your Trust1 API endpoint, e.g. "https://api.status.salesforce.com".

statusLinkUrl.description: The base url of your Trust1 endpoint for a sample's related links, e.g. "http://status.salesforce.com/status/".

statusMap.description: An object which maps each Trust1 status enum value to a sample value, messageCode and messageBody.

transform.transform: function e(e,s){return{name:'Trust',url:`${e}/${s}`}}function s(e,s){return'number'==typeof s&&s>=4&&'string'==typeof e&&e.length>s?e.substring(0,s-3)+'...':e}const t=aspects[0].name,a=`${ctx.baseTrustUrl}/v1/instances/status/preview`,r=[],o={};return subjects.forEach(e=>o[e.name.toLowerCase()]=e.absolutePath),res.body.filter(e=>e.hasOwnProperty('key')&&o[e.key.toLowerCase()]).forEach(a=>{const n=ctx.statusMap[a.status]||{messageBody:'',messageCode:''},u=o[a.key.toLowerCase()];r.push({messageBody:s(n.messageBody||'',4096),messageCode:n.messageCode||'',name:`${u}|${t}`,relatedLinks:[e(ctx.statusLinkUrl,a.key)],value:n.value||a.status}),delete o[a.key.toLowerCase()]}),Object.keys(o).forEach(s=>r.push({messageBody:`Status for ${s} not returned by ${a}.`,messageCode:'',name:`${o[s]}|${t}`,relatedLinks:[e(ctx.statusLinkUrl,s)],value:ctx.errorValue})),r
